description.value:
A good pair of gloves is a critical item for any soldier, particularly if you plan to get up close to your enemy. When you wear these black leather gloves with fine silver stitching, you gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Climb], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Reposition].

Activateâ€”Sticky Grip 1 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You have an enemy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained]

Effect Your gloves help you squeeze even more tightly, keeping your opponent from moving freely. The enemy you have grabbed or restrained is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.
